profileText: a Representative from Georgia; born in Las Vegas, Clark County, Nev., October 7, 1968; graduated from Central Catholic High School, Portland, Oreg., 1986; B.S., Oregon State University, Corvallis, Oreg., 1990; M.B.A., National University, San Diego, Calif.; M.D., Morehouse School of Medicine, Atlanta, Ga., 2010; United States Marine Corps, 1990-2006; instructor, Morehouse College, Atlanta, Ga.; instructor, Georgia Institute of Technology, Atlanta, Ga.; United States Navy, 2013-2017; physician; unsuccessful candidate for election to the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress in 2020; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress (January 3, 2023-present).
